Package ohos.data.search.schema

Class MusicItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.search.model.IndexData
      • ohos.data.search.schema.Schema<MusicItem>
        • ohos.data.search.schema.MusicItem

  • public final class MusicItem
extends Schema<MusicItem>
    Represents the index schema for music items.

    This schema is used to create indexes for music items. It supports index fields album, genre, artist, duration, size, and all the fields in CommonItem. Among these fields, identifier is mandatory and can be set via the CommonItem#setIdentifier(String) method.

    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_SEARCH
